Articles.Content:
I just created a Kerbal fan group on facebook. Here is the link.

https://www.facebook.com/groups/622954034417159/
And what do you provide that's not on the other Facebook groups?

Who uses facebook anymore?

Lots of people, myself included. Hard to do a KSP Instagram without extra steps. Vines are too short to communicate anything meaningful about the game with. Why not Facebook?

Lots of people, myself included. Hard to do a KSP Instagram without extra steps. Vines are too short to communicate anything meaningful about the game with. Why not Facebook?

Well i'm just sayin that all my friends use instagram or vine but everyone back on topic!
Is this going to be like "What did you do in KSP today?" combined with second-hand announcements with a smattering of terrible quizzes telling you what Kerbal you are?
